summary:
Sararad Save File "She's the cutest yet she can be the hero she was born to be"
"For those who want to play my character I've created by hand"
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][size=3][size=2]
[size=3][center][font=Comic Sans MS][font=Trebuchet MS][/font]
[/font][center][font=Comic Sans MS][u][size=5]<< ALL CAPITAL LETTERS ARE EXETREMELY IMPORTANT DETAILS>>[/size][/u]
[/font][/center][center]
[font=Comic Sans MS][b][u][size=6]<<Description>>[/size][/u][/b]
[b][u][size=4](This mod page only contains the save files for Sararad)[/size]
[/u][/b]
Sararad (Pronounced "Sara" - "Rad") is a custom made character that I've made over the course of these last few months.
"She's the cutest yet she can be the hero she was born to be."
[/font][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS]Usually I use her to test mods out, to mess around, or just as a follower in my lets play series. (I use the mod "familiar faces" for her to be my follower)
I decided to let others play as her preset as well.
--This mod page contains the save files for Sararad--
[/font][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font][/center][center]
[font=Comic Sans MS][b][u][size=6]<<Details>>
[/size][size=4]--(About Sararad)--[/size][/u][/b]
Her armor (currently from version 1.1) is the Merta Black Rose Armor (As seen in the screen shots)
(so if you happen to get on and she is naked you now know why)
[/font][/center][center]
[font=Comic Sans MS]She is a level 51 in version 1.1 (blacksmithing is maxed out as well as a few other skills)
She is situated within Riften.[/font][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS][b][u][size=4]--(About the files)--[/size][/u][/b]
[/font][/center][center]
[font=Comic Sans MS]All files contain a READ ME, both of the saves .ess and .skse, and a screenshot from the mod page (just so you can make sure you have all the correct mods)
[/font][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS]The READ ME Install Instructions can be found on the READ ME as well as the mod page.
[/font][/center][/center][center]
[font=Comic Sans MS][b][u][size=6]<<Installation>>
[/size](To install read the READ ME file and do the following)[/u][/b]
Once you have downloaded the zip folder un zip it.
Open the folder up and you should see the READ ME, Screenshot and the .ess and .skse
Drag and drop both the .ess and the .skse files in your Documents/My Games/Skyrim/Saves
Run the Game Once you've install all the required mods (read the UNP Section carefully!) and load the save.[/font][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS]BOOM! It should be there have fun![/font][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS]
[/font][/center]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][u][b]<<Versions/Change Log>[/b][/u][size=3]

[/size][/size][size=4][b][u]Version 1.1[/u][/b][/size]
Required mods the same.
should look just like the Merta Black Rose Armor Screenshots
 contains the READ ME, .ess and .skse and the Screenshot
[/font]
[/size][center][/center][/size][center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=2][/size][/font][/center][/size][center][u][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][b]<<[/b][b]Required Mods>>[/b][/size][/font][/u][/center][center][size=3]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Version 1.1 and possible futher version require the mods in order to get the looks from the screen shots.[/font][/size][/center][center][size=3]
[b][u][font=Comic Sans MS]("MODS" LINKS INCLUDED)[/font][/u][/b][/size][/center][center][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS][b][u]UNP Replacer Configuration Package>>[/u][/b] [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20884/][u][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#0066cc]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20884/[/color][/font][/u][/url][font=Comic Sans MS]?
This mod above contains a lot of other mods. Install it by selecting the following in install menu.) ("Next" means click next.)
(UNP Base Normal / Fair Face Pretty Face / UNP Delicate Body / "Next" / No More Bronze / Fair Skin Shaved / "Next" / XP32 Maximum Skeleton / (Bikini's are optional) / "finish")[/font][/size][/center][center][size=3]
[b][font=Comic Sans MS]Brows>> [/font][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/][u][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#0066cc]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/[/color][/font][/u][/url][font=Comic Sans MS]?
[/font][/size][/center][center][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS][b][u]SG Hair Pack (I promise this link is safe) (currently it is not on the nexus)>> [/u][/b][url=https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B5ovhttJqGRWZUZsODlENTk1bGs/edit][u][color=#0066cc]https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B5ovhttJqGRWZUZsODlENTk1bGs/edit[/color][/u][/url][url=https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B5ovhttJqGRWZUZsODlENTk1bGs/edit]
[/url][b][u][/u][/b][/font][/size][/center][center][size=3][b][u]
[font=Comic Sans MS]The Eyes Of Beauty>> [/font][/u][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/][u][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#0066cc]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/[/color][/font][/u][/url][font=Comic Sans MS]?

[/font][/size][/center][center][size=3][b][u][font=Comic Sans MS]RaceMenu>> [/font][/u][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/][u][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#0066cc]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/[/color][/font][/u][/url][font=Comic Sans MS]?

[/font][/size][/center][center][size=3][b][u][font=Comic Sans MS]SKSE>> [/font][/u][/b][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/][u][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#0066cc]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/color][/font][/u][/url]

[/size][/center][center][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS][b][u]SkyUI>>[/u][/b] (not sure if you do need but if you have SKSE you should have this mod) [/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/][u][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#0066cc]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/[/color][/font][/u][/url][font=Comic Sans MS]?

[/font][/size][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][size=6][b][u]<<Permissions>>[/u][/b]
[/size]You may convert Sararad into a follower, but if you do make sure to give me credit and let me know you did. (its very much appreciated)[/size]
[/font][/center][/size][center][font=Comic Sans MS][/font][/center][center][/center][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][size=6][b][u]<<Videos>>
[/u][/b][/size]
[youtube]LdhLFRq65RU[/youtube]
[/size][/font][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][b][u]<<Other things to take note>>[/u][/b][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Make sure you install it right (install instructions above "versions/change logs" section)
Be kind and take the time to thank me if you would like too.
Be sure to endorse the file if you find it good.
Those who came over from my channel, I appreciate you checking the mod out. If you enjoyed the mod then let me know in the comments or here.
Be sure to let me know if there are any bugs or any problems with the files or installation

[b][size=6]Thanks for checking my mod page out! =)[/size][/b]
[/size][/font][/center]
author: Kenerad
